title: 1 bedroom Basement apt $1300/ month includes utilities!
posting_body: This is a 1 bedroom basement apt.
Apartment has been completely renovated.
Flooring includes
wall to wall carpeting in the middle room, hardwood floor Bedroom and hallway.
Modern laminate flooring in bathroom and Kitchen.
Currently adding a second coat of paint.
Pictures reflect the beige paint job and new grey color walls.
Full size gas stove & Refrigerator
Utilities included this includes heat, gas, water and electricity.
Safe neighborhood 1 block from beach and 5 minute walk to Swampscott commuter rail.
Coin operated washer and dryer in building.
Located on bus line.
First and last month required with a one year lease.
If interested please email to make an appointment
sorry no pets and no smoking no exceptions!
If you would like to see the apartment please make sure you answer the questions below
If the posting is visible on craigslist it is still available**
Please e-mail me with the answers to the following questions.
1) Who is the apartment for?
How many people?
2) Do you currently live in an apartment and have a landlord reference?
3) Do you currently have a work reference and or a verifiable source of income?
4) what is your verifiable source of income
5) What is your phone number and when is the best time to reach you?
6)What is your first and last name
7)What is your email address
I will be checking my e-mail frequently and will call you to set up appointments.
This apt is available August 1st
